phrase: 0  The EC tells the INQ about the change of his master data .
1  The INQ notifies the IP of the change .
2  The IP checks whether the master data can be changed at the desired time .
3  The IP confirms the changes of the INQ or the IP rejects the changes of the INQ .

act id: error codes: missing activity = m, wrong order = w, ambiguous = a, else leave empty
The EC tells the INQ about the change of his master data.
The INQ notifies the IP of the change.
The IP checks whether the master data can be changed at the desired time.
The IP confirms the changes of the INQ or the IP rejects the changes of the INQ.
